knowledge.description: All your brand knowledge is indexed into a central repository, giving your AI agents instant, accurate recall for perfectly consistent content.
knowledge.title: Creates a Knowledge Hub

voice.description: AI agents identify your unique tone, terminology, and stylistic patterns to create a brand voice profile that guides all content creation.
voice.title: Captures Your Voice & Style

website.description: Our system crawls your entire website to understand your business, products, and messaging, forming the foundation of its knowledge.
website.title: Learns From Your Website

brandLearning.description: ContentaGen performs a deep analysis of your website and brand documents to build a unique "Brand Brain." This ensures every piece of content perfectly captures your voice, style, and business objectives—eliminating endless revisions.
brandLearning.title: An AI That Knows Your Brand Better Than an Intern

community.description: Join our Discord community to connect with the core team, get priority support, share what you're building, and help shape the future of ContentaGen.
community.title: Build the Future of Content, Together.

competitorIntelligence.description: Go beyond simple tracking. ContentaGen analyzes competitor content to identify their strategies, find market gaps, and generate data-driven ideas that outperform.

gaps.description: Automatically analyze competitor content to find underserved topics and strategic opportunities.
gaps.title: Uncover Strategic Gaps

ideas.description: Create data-driven content ideas designed to outperform competitors in search rankings and engagement.
ideas.title: Generate Winning Ideas

tracking.description: Keep a real-time pulse on your competitors' product features to inform your own roadmap and positioning.
tracking.title: Automate Feature Tracking

competitorIntelligence.title: Decode Your Market and Dominate Your Niche

contentWorkflow.description: ContentaGen automates the entire content pipeline while maintaining the quality and brand consistency you demand. Your workflow, fully automated.

draft.description: A full-length, structured article is written from scratch, adhering strictly to your brand guidelines and voice.
draft.title: 4. On-Brand First Drafts, Instantly

idea.description: Provide your agent with a topic, a list of keywords, or approve an AI-generated idea to kickstart the creation process.
idea.title: 2. Kickstart with a Simple Idea

publish.description: Deploy your polished content directly to your blog or any application using our powerful TypeScript SDK.
publish.title: 6. Publish with the SDK

research.description: The agent analyzes SERPs, competitor articles, and your internal Brand Brain to gather the most relevant information.
research.title: 3. Automated Research & Analysis

review.description: Review the generated draft in your dashboard, make final tweaks with the inline editor, and approve it for publishing with a single click.
review.title: 5. Review, Tweak, and Approve

strategy.description: Configure your AI agent with your brand's unique voice, audience, and purpose to create a consistent content foundation.
strategy.title: 1. Set Your Strategy Once

contentWorkflow.title: From Idea to Published Article in Minutes, Not Weeks.

cta.title: Ready to Automate Your Content Strategy?

brandVoice.answer: Our system performs a deep analysis by crawling your website and any brand documents you provide. It identifies your unique tone, terminology, and stylistic patterns to build a 'Brand Brain' that guides all content creation, ensuring everything sounds authentically like you.
brandVoice.question: How does ContentaGen learn my brand voice?

competitorIntelligence.answer: You provide the website URL of a competitor, and our system analyzes their site to extract their key product features and brand information. This allows you to track their strategy and identify market opportunities for your own content.
competitorIntelligence.question: How does the competitor intelligence work?

contentTypes.answer: Currently, our agents are optimized for creating structured Articles, in-depth Tutorials, interview-style Q&As, and product Changelogs. We are continuously expanding our content layout capabilities.
contentTypes.question: What types of content can ContentaGen create?

customization.answer: Yes. The agent creation process is designed for deep customization. You define the agent's purpose, audience, voice, brand adherence, and more. This persona, combined with the knowledge from your website, tailors the agent to your industry.
customization.question: Can I customize the AI agents for my specific industry?

openSource.answer: Yes, ContentaGen is 100% open source under the Apache-2.0 license. You can view the code, contribute to its development, or self-host the entire platform for free, forever. We believe in transparency and community collaboration.
openSource.question: Is this project open source?

usageCredits.answer: On our paid plans, you can enable pay-as-you-go to continue generating content beyond your plan's included credits. The Free plan does not include additional usage, but you can upgrade at any time.
usageCredits.question: What happens if I exceed my usage credits?

faq.subtitle: Your questions answered
faq.supportText: Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our
faq.title: FAQs

hero.subtitle: The open-source AI platform that learns your brand, analyzes competitors, and publishes high-quality content—automatically.

community.title: Community Driven

free.description: Self-host ContentaGen for free, forever. No vendor lock-in, no hidden costs, just pure open source freedom.
free.title: Free Forever

transparency.description: Every line of code is public. See exactly how ContentaGen works, from AI prompts to database schemas.
transparency.title: Full Transparency

pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits you. No hidden fees, cancel anytime.

modern.description: Designed for static site generators like Astro and Next.js to build high-performance, statically-generated sites.
modern.title: Built for Modern Frameworks

secure.description: Robust API key authentication and consistent error handling for building production-grade applications.
secure.title: Secure & Reliable

typeSafety.description: Full TypeScript support with Zod validation ensures your data is always what you expect, from API to render.
typeSafety.title: End-to-End Type Safety

sdk.description: Our TypeScript SDK is more than just an API client. It's a complete content toolkit designed for developers who need reliable, type-safe access to AI-generated content.
sdk.title: Integrate Content, Automate Everything.

socialProof.author: Licitei Team
socialProof.quote: Using ContentaGen has been like unlocking a secret content creation superpower. It's the perfect fusion of AI intelligence and human creativity, enabling us to create content that is as engaging as it is effective.
